commit.message:
Add "Blocksdir" to Debug window

To get the current blocksdir is valuable for debug purposes after
merging #12653.

To get the current blocksdir is valuable for debug purposes after

commit.message: Add tooltips for both datadir and blocksdir

verification.payload:
tree b1de1da187cb3828e3c09e6cdf6afac5679e0f00
parent 3045704502e8a241b60b847fd52fcbed3129a2e4
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1538773551 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1538994809 +0300

Add tooltips for both datadir and blocksdir

files.patch:
@@ -127,6 +127,9 @@
          <property name="cursor">
           <cursorShape>IBeamCursor</cursorShape>
          </property>
+         <property name="toolTip">
+          <string>To specify a non-default location of the data directory use the '%1' option.</string>
+         </property>
          <property name="text">
           <string>N/A</string>
          </property>
@@ -153,6 +156,9 @@
          <property name="cursor">
           <cursorShape>IBeamCursor</cursorShape>
          </property>
+         <property name="toolTip">
+          <string>To specify a non-default location of the blocks directory use the '%1' option.</string>
+         </property>
          <property name="text">
           <string>N/A</string>
          </property>
